alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Hodgeman; Lane (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 26 at 4:09PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THROUGH LATE AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 044...064...078 AND 088... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane...Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman...Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford and Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Timing...Sunday Afternoon * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Temperatures...Mid 70s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
